turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to place an order for three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what flavor would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like thin crust with pepperoni, extra cheese and peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Put pepperoni, extra cheese and banana peppers on the first two and only pepperoni on the third. Thank you for asking.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me make sure i got your order correctly: 3 medium pizzas, pepperoni, extra cheese and banana peppers on the first two and only pepperoni on the third.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes and all three with thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. thin crust on all three, any other special instructions?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bella Luna's.
